text: 46|10|Sihamtaka koraa, ‘koraacona tomaloke, yadi e'i kora'ana allahara taraphara paraa aratirna hai thake arau tomaloke iyaka asbikara karaicha, athaca bani icharaa'ilara ejana saksiye e'i bisaye anuraupa saksi pradana karai tara prati imana anile; kintu tomaloke aud'dhatya prakasa karaila, (teneha’le tomalokara parainama ki ha’ba?) Niscaya allahe yalima sampradayaka hidayata nakarae’.
